channel.title: GTL Vote Help
channel.description:
What is after that ?
[url=http://www.power-scape.net/voting]here[/url]
Edit:Im not advertising here please do not blame me.

item.title: GTL Vote Help
item.dc:creator: @hatem hatem
item.description:
@hatem wrote:

[quote=“penguinimp, post:4, topic:529384”][quote author=hatem link=topic=648139.msg4359739#msg4359739 date=1378459766]

Hello Hatem Ibrahem,
Your hosting provider, trentahost.com should be able to help you set this up.

They will be kinda mad that I suggested it though.
Just ask them for help setting up MySQL database and the information. Should be fairly simple.

host (database address) should be localhost, unless you have a remote server which is rare.

Then you’ll need to create a database.
create a user/password, then assign that user to the database.

if you are running cpanel
cPanel ----> Database section —> MySQL Databases ---->

First of all i’m thankful for helping me ;), second face me on skype :
Killlove92
[/quote]

I’m at work. Sorry man. Working for a webhosting company i know how to do this, however I am not available at the moment.

most web hosting companies should be available 24/7, They should be able to help you setup a database for the first time.[/quote]
Well , Thanks for helping anyway

Read full topic

I’m at work. Sorry man. Working for a webhosting company i know how to do this, however I am not available at the moment.

most web hosting companies should be available 24/7, They should be able to help you setup a database for the first time.

Read full topic
